thread.title: Matthews Previewing Trump Speech: ‘A Lot of Us Still Wish We Got the Wrong Envelope’
thread.title_full: Matthews Previewing Trump Speech: ‘A Lot of Us Still Wish We Got the Wrong Envelope’

author: Josh Feldman
title: Matthews Previewing Trump Speech: ‘A Lot of Us Still Wish We Got the Wrong Envelope’
text:
Matthews Previewing Trump Speech: ‘A Lot of Us Still Wish We Got the Wrong Envelope’ by Josh Feldman | 8:56   
Chris Matthews expressed tonight his continued bewilderment at how Donald Trump is president by joking, “A lot of us still wish we got the wrong envelope the last three months.” 
A lot of the jokes about the insane Oscars snafu were indeed election-related . 
Matthews told Brian Williams and Rachel Maddow , “I wake up and I go, ‘Wait a minute, this has really happened. This isn’t a gag reel, this has been three months of reality.'” 
Matthews also predicted that no Democrats will be clapping for Trump and they will just stick to “frowns” most of the evening, while Republicans will be showing “tremendous support.” 
Watch above, via MSNBC.
